This page provides information about the valid indicative distribution map for the ecosystem functional group [**F1.6 Episodic arid rivers**](/efg-info/F1_6.qmd). For older or alternative maps, see [here](/map-info/F1_6_history.qmd).

## Methods

Here is the methods summary for **Map code and version**: F1.6.web.mix v1.0.

> Freshwater ecoregions (Abell et al. 2008) were identified as containing occurrences of these functional groups if: i) their descriptions mentioned features consistent with those identified in the profile of the Ecosystem Functional Group; and ii) if their location was consistent with the ecological drivers described in the profile. Within the selected ecoregions, remote sensing estimates of ephemeral surface water (classes 4, 5 and 8 from Pekel et al. 2016) were used to identify major occurrences. The remaining areas of selected ecoregions were mapped as minor occurrences.

::: {.cell}

:::

### Datasets

**FEOW-2008** (Abell et al. 2008):

Source of _biogeographical range_.
 Resolution: variable (polygons), static.
 Accuracy evaluation: qualitative (experts judgement).

 **GSW-1.1** (Pekel et al. 2016):

Source of _Surface water phenology_.
 Resolution: <1km2, periods/epochs.
 Accuracy evaluation: >90%.

## How to use the data

### Available files

:::{.aside}

Following maps are considered current and valid indicative distribution maps for this ecosystem functional group. `Web navigation` maps are optimised for use in webapps, but they have similar methods and differ only in details of format and processing. 

- Indicative Map (**code: F1.6.IM.mix**, version v2.0) 
 - Web navigation (**code: F1.6.web.mix**, version v1.0) 


:::

You can download geospatial data for this map from the following sources:

**F1.6.web.mix** (v1.0): [Google Cloud bucket](gs://iucn_get_l3_im/F1.6.web.mix_v1.0.tif){target="gisdata"} :: [Zenodo repository (bundle of maps)](http://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.5090419){target="gisdata"} :: [Zenodo repository (EFG map)](https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.5090972){target="gisdata"} :: [Mapbox tileset](https://studio.mapbox.com/tilesets/jrfep.F1_6_web_mix){target="gisdata"} :: [Earth Engine assets](projects/earthengine-legacy/assets/users/jrferrerparis/IUCN-GET/L3_IndMaps/){target="gisdata"}

Note that you need to login to some services like [mapbox](https://www.mapbox.com){target="links"} or [earthengine](https://earthengine.google.com){target="links"}, and in some cases you also need to request access to the files.
